snippet.title: The Wizards - Dark Times E3 Reveal Trailer
snippet.description:
Darkness gathers over the Realm of Meliora... 
As a new threat disrupts the flow of time, it falls to you to once again take magic into your hands and push back against the encroaching evil.

Take up your motion controllers and prepare for a new adventure in this standalone add-on for Carbon Studio's acclaimed VR spellcaster, The Wizards! 

Coming soon to VR!

Official Website: 
http://darktimesgame.com/

Official Community Discord
http://discord.gg/becomeawizard

Remember to add the game to your wishlist: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1103860/The_Wizards__Dark_Times/
